meanings.definition: Consisting of or involving a single element or component.
meanings.sent1: The unary puzzle only had one piece.
meanings.sent2: She preferred the unary color scheme of black and white.
meanings.sent3: The unary cookie was so small, it could fit on a dime.
meanings.sent4: His unary focus on the task at hand made him a great employee.
meanings.sent5: The unary star shone brightly in the night sky.

meanings.definition: Involving or relating to a single unit or entity.
meanings.sent1: The unary key unlocked the mysterious box.
meanings.sent2: The unary decision was made by the committee.
meanings.sent3: The unary cat sat alone on the windowsill, looking out at the world.
meanings.sent4: Her unary dedication to her craft made her stand out among her peers.
meanings.sent5: The unary tree stood tall in the middle of the field.
